author: Angie (Sweet Sidekick)
title: Macy’s: Men’s Under Armour Slide Sandals Only $9.98, Puma Sneakers Just $19.98 + More
text:
Head over to Macy’s.com where they are offering up awesome deals on Men’s Shoes . Shipping is free with a $49+ order OR score free shipping on ANY size order when you add select beauty items to your cart – prices start as low as $4. Or choose free in-store pickup if available near you.

Here are a few deals you can score… K-Swiss Men’s Hoke Casual Sneakers 
Only $14.98 (reg. $59.99)
Under Armour Men’s Strike Grid Slide Sandals 
Only $9.98 – price shown in cart 
Under Armour Men’s Strike Optic Slide Sandals 
Only $9.98 – price shown in cart 

Puma Men’s Match Emboss Leather Casual Sneakers in Wine or Navy 
Only $19.98 (reg. up to $74.99)

Puma Men’s Meteor Running Sneakers 
Only $19.98 (reg. $59.99)
+ More!
